data.persona: I am poor and dirty. I hate that I am starving to death. I am a hard worker.
data.description:
You are in the Meadow.
This meadow is composed of green, luscious, rolling hills. Flowers dot the expanse. In the evening, one may stand from the hills of this meadow and see the sun set beneath the horizon off in the distance.
There's some green, luscious, rolling hills and some flowers here.

You are carrying a bible, a small sachel, and some moldy bread, wearing some muddy shoes, some pants that have holes in them, and a shirt, and wielding a rock and a hammer.

data.mid_motivation: I want to pick some flowers in the meadow.
data.long_motivation: I am picking flowers to bring happiness to distract from my poverty.
